pr_title: feature: support configuring scan target for GlobalTransactionScanner

timeline.message: feature: Can exclude beans that do not need to be scanned in the GlobalTransactionScanner
添加扫描排除器接口，并开发了三种添加排除器的方式：1）spring bean, 2）/META-INF/services，3）GlobalTransactionScanner.addScannerExcluders()
bugfix: GlobalTransactionScanner类实现BeanFactoryPostProcessor，使其比配置更早初始化，导致配置信息无法正常获取并设置到其中。
添加Scope扫描排除器。目前排除了request、session、job、step四种scope.
优化ScopeScannerExcluder。Scope注解添加在类上时，也能排除掉。
添加配置类扫描排除器。

timeline.bodyText: Please define constants for those names.

+package io.seata.spring.annotation.scannerexcluders;
+
+import io.seata.common.loader.LoadLevel;
+import io.seata.spring.annotation.ScannerExcluder;
+import org.springframework.beans.factory.config.BeanDefinition;
+
+/**
+ * Config scanner excluder.
+ *
+ * @author wang.liang
+ */
+@LoadLevel(name = "ConfigBeans", order = 100)
+public class ConfigBeansScannerExcluder implements ScannerExcluder {
+
+    public boolean isMatch(Object bean, String beanName, BeanDefinition beanDefinition) throws Throwable {
